column4: I also found the same problem on my Ubuntu 12.04 box. To get it working, I have to start CCSM, uncheck the settings related to screen corners & then re-enable them. However, some reboots it works fine & sometimes you have  to go back to CCSM...
Yeah I know about that workaround. I don't want to set the setting each time. No fix?
unfortunately not. But do you have to set these settings each time you log in?
myself, I found that it sometimes works without problems & sometimes I need the workaround...
